## ğŸ¯ Quick Start

### Generate UUID/Handle
1. Press `Ctrl+Shift+P`
2. Type "BG3"
3. Select command (Generate UUID/Handle)

### Use Code Snippets
1. Open a .txt or .lsx file
2. Type snippet name (e.g., `armor`)
3. Press `Tab`
4. Fill in the fields

### Format Stats File
1. Open any .txt file
2. Press `Ctrl+Shift+I`
3. File auto-formats with proper alignment
